name: radioactivity_concentration_of_252Cf_in_air
description: "Radioactivity" means the number of radioactive decays of a material per second. "Radioactivity concentration" means radioactivity per unit volume of the medium. "Cf" means the element "californium" and "252Cf" is the isotope "californium-252" with a half-life of 9.68e+02 days.
